remarks: A poset is an antisymmetric preset. _EDITORIAL_: could become the definition of poset.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Feb-2015.)
statement:
ispos2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
ispos2.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
ispos2 $p |- ( K e. Poset <-> ( K e. Preset /\ A. x e. B A. y e. B ( ( x .<_ y /\ y .<_ x ) -> x = y ) ) ) $.
$d .<_ x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d K x y $.
